activateAccountDesc: Enter email, that you have been contacting with our person. We will send verification code to ensure that thus is your email
provideVerificationCodeDesc: Verification code has been sent to your email ${email}, open the mail box, and enter the code below
setupPasswordDesc: Password will be used for logging in to this panel. Don't share this password with anyone, us included
activationCompletedDesc: You have completed activation account process, you can now login
